snippet: A new strain is believed to have already killed two people and left one in critical condition.
abstract: China says that four more people have been infected with new strain of bird flu, believed to have killed two Shanghai residents in March.
lead_paragraph: A new strain is believed to have already killed two people and left one in critical condition.

headline.seo: China Announces 4 New Bird Flu Cases
headline.main: China Announces 4 New Bird Flu Cases
headline.print_headline: China Announces 4 New Bird Flu Cases
